NIHSlcms 0.0.0.9002

Filter by retention time

lcms_filterRTmin.Rd

The function converts seconds into minutes to cut and keep a range of the retention time in minutes.

lcms_filterRTmin(lcms_dataset, rt = c(4, 14))

Arguments

lcms_dataset

An lcms_dataset_family object
rt

Range of the retention time to keep in minutes

Value

A filtered dataset with the range of selected rt

See also

Other lcms_dataset functions: lcms_dataset_load, lcms_filterPolarity, lcms_filterSampleType, lcms_meta_export, lcms_meta_read, lcms_plot_tics, lcms_tics

Other lcms_filtering functions: lcms_filterPolarity, lcms_filterSampleType

Examples


rtime_range = c(4,14)
lcms_dataset <- lcms_dataset_load(system.file("extdata","lcms_dataset_metadata.rds",package = "NIHSlcms"))
lcms_dataset_rt <-lcms_filterRTmin(lcms_dataset, rt = rtime_range)

print(lcms_dataset_rt)
#> MSn experiment data ("OnDiskMSnExp")
